commands.name: az network private-dns record-set aaaa add-record
commands.syntax:
az network private-dns record-set aaaa add-record --ipv6-address
                                                  --record-set-name
                                                  --resource-group
                                                  --zone-name
examples:
az network private-dns record-set aaaa add-record -g MyResourceGroup -z www.mysite.com \
    -n MyRecordSet -a MyIpv6Address

commands.name: az network private-dns record-set aaaa create
commands.summary: Create an empty AAAA record set.
commands.syntax:
az network private-dns record-set aaaa create --name
                                              --resource-group
                                              --zone-name
                                              [--metadata]
                                              [--ttl]
examples: az network private-dns record-set aaaa create -g MyResourceGroup -z www.mysite.com -n MyRecordSet

commands.name: az network private-dns record-set aaaa delete
commands.summary: Delete an AAAA record set and all associated records.
commands.syntax:
az network private-dns record-set aaaa delete [--ids]
                                              [--if-match]
                                              [--name]
                                              [--resource-group]
                                              [--subscription]
                                              [--yes]
                                              [--zone-name]
examples: az network private-dns record-set aaaa delete -g MyResourceGroup -z www.mysite.com -n MyRecordSet

commands.name: az network private-dns record-set aaaa list
commands.summary: List all AAAA record sets in a zone.
commands.syntax:
az network private-dns record-set aaaa list --resource-group
                                            --zone-name
                                            [--max-items]
                                            [--next-token]
examples: az network private-dns record-set aaaa list -g MyResourceGroup -z www.mysite.com

commands.name: az network private-dns record-set aaaa remove-record
commands.summary: Remove AAAA record from its record set.
commands.syntax:
az network private-dns record-set aaaa remove-record --ipv6-address
                                                     --record-set-name
                                                     --resource-group
                                                     --zone-name
                                                     [--keep-empty-record-set]
examples:
az network private-dns record-set aaaa remove-record -g MyResourceGroup -z www.mysite.com \
    -n MyRecordSet -a MyIpv6Address

commands.name: az network private-dns record-set aaaa show
commands.summary: Get the details of an AAAA record set.
commands.syntax:
az network private-dns record-set aaaa show [--ids]
                                            [--name]
                                            [--resource-group]
                                            [--subscription]
                                            [--zone-name]
examples: az network private-dns record-set aaaa show -g MyResourceGroup -z www.mysite.com -n MyRecordSet

commands.name: az network private-dns record-set aaaa update
commands.syntax:
az network private-dns record-set aaaa update [--add]
                                              [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                              [--ids]
                                              [--if-match]
                                              [--metadata]
                                              [--name]
                                              [--remove]
                                              [--resource-group]
                                              [--set]
                                              [--subscription]
                                              [--zone-name]
examples: az network private-dns record-set aaaa update -g MyResourceGroup -z www.mysite.com -n MyRecordSet --metadata owner=WebTeam
